Reviews.Title: Compatability
Reviews.Author: David Liu
Reviews.Content: I don't know it works well with USA mobile carriers or not? At least I could not use to make phone calls through T-Mobile. It is very difficult to find the signal spot, almost no service shown and of course not mentioned how bars you will have. Wi-Fi is good. I think this is a tablet instead of smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Fake China Phone
Reviews.Author: Honest
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this phone if you are actually looking for a lenovo phone. The a830 and a820 are fake phones, china copies. Go to the lenovo website and look for those phones and you won't see them.
